entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:25 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 07:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
